thread.title: Intelex Technologies Appoints Rob Harrison as Director, EHSQ Content Strategy

author: cnbc.com
title: Intelex Technologies Appoints Rob Harrison as Director, EHSQ Content Strategy
text:
EHSQ industry software maven to strengthen Alliance company vision
TORONTO, Feb. 23, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Intelex Technologies, a leading global provider of cloud-based Environmental, Health, Safety and Quality (EHSQ) management software, announced today the appointment of Rob Harrison as Director, EHSQ Content Strategy.
In his role, Harrison will lead the Intelex EHSQ content team and guide the overall EHSQ content strategy for the EHSQ Alliance. He will focus on providing Intelex's market leading platform and the EHSQ Alliance with relevant, trusted and actionable content. Diverse content sources include global EHSQ experts and organizations that understand and promote community and collaboration as a pillar for strengthening customers' sustainable business practices by transforming their EHSQ performance, their organizational culture, and their industries.
"We are pleased to welcome Rob as he brings exceptional industry experience to our growing team" said Elie Mouzon, Chief Strategy Officer at Intelex. "His contribution to setting the standard for the future of how EHSQ professionals collaborate, innovate and accelerate their businesses will ultimately reshape the industry."
Harrison has nearly 2 decades of experience in EHSQ technology solutions. He has built and helped design EHSQ software, implemented and supported global deployments of EHSQ solutions that have transformed EHSQ culture and performance in diverse industries including automotive, food & beverage, chemicals, life sciences, mining & metals, consumer goods, packaging and electronics & semiconductors. He has previously served as Director Market Strategy for IQS, Quality Practice Analyst with LNS Research, Director of Product Management, Product Marketing Manager, Professional Services Manager and Sales Engineering Manager for BSI (Entropy Software).
"Intelex is basically setting the standard for the future of how EHSQ professionals learn, support, implement, accelerate and improve their businesses and ultimately shape their careers," Harrison said. "Intelex disrupting our industry with the EHSQ Alliance and the promise to share collective intelligence, democratize regulatory insights and drive improvement via shared benchmarking and performance insight philosophy was the winning combination for me."
About Intelex Technologies :
With more than 1,000 clients and 1 million users, Intelex Technologies Inc. is a global leader in environmental, health, safety and quality (EHSQ) management software. Since 1992 its scalable, web-based platform and applications have helped clients across all industries improve business performance, mitigate organization-wide risk, and ensure sustained compliance with internationally accepted standards (e.g., ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 and OHSAS 18001) and regulatory requirements. Intelex is one of North America's fastest-growing tech companies, the recipient of Waterstone's Most Admired Corporate Cultures award, Aon Hewitt's best employer award, and previous repeat winner of Deloitte's Best Managed Companies award. For more information, visit www.intelex.com .
